name: task_assigner_tool
description: It can work on only one file at a time, This tool will read the file comments and assign the correct resource as per the coding guidelines and update the code and return a successful execution of the task with summary of the code that has been added

file_name.description: file name where the file is to be created, like index.html, script.js, header.html

task_guidelines.description: Pass the names of tags, additionally correct component names so the code can be written in the correct file. Use web-components only. Never use React or any other framework.
